title: Lets talk support rek sai
body:
So i had a game a while ago with rek sai as support and i decided to go AP.... And the results were hilarious lol.

He has a gapcloser, a knockup, good roaming and a poke that has a 1.0 AP scaling.... And i did around 1/2 of ahri's health with each q, it is good... I think

replies.body: Thats like saying, why not Zac support? Gap closer, knock up, slow, sustain passive.
But then you realize that many other support can do all of that, if not even more.
Why does everyone call Rek'Sai a guy?

Going support as Rek has plenty of merits.... but going AP is pretty derp. 
If you want to pugstomp go for it, but tanking up and letting his natural scaling to do the damage would be a better option imo for support Rek.
